title: Diamond 3 LFT for Tournament
body:
Reached Diamond 3 (Top 400) beginning of this season maining Mid, then took break waiting for solo queue to be released. D4 atm and not currently climbing or grinding, since not really motivated.

Can play all roles in this order Mid > ADC > Top > JG = Top = Supp

Interested in playing in a team environment, since this season has been based around dynamic queue.

Looking for more of a serious/plan-based team rather than fun/social.

Available most days.

Reply to this post since i'll be checking it frequently or add me in game. (Just created this smurf account, Add me on this since ill be leveling it up)
